Method Detail

getRealClass

public static java.lang.Class<? extends Entity> getRealClass(Entity entity)
Returns the real class of the given entity. If it is a proxy, return the entity class, not the proxy class

getRealRootClass

public static java.lang.Class<? extends Entity> getRealRootClass(Entity entity)
Returns the real root class of the given entity. If it is a proxy, return the entity class, not the proxy class. For example, if trying getRootRealClass(MemberAccountProxy), the result will be Account.

toIdsAsList

public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> toIdsAsList(java.util.Collection<? extends Entity> entities)
converts a Collection of Entities into an ArrayList of their id's.

Parameters:
entities. - The input list of Entities. Can be null or empty.
Returns:
An ArrayList of the ids. Returns an empty list if the input was null or an empty list.
